title: This might be a stupid question
body: But since i live in australia do i have to pay extra for 50$ of rp Like steam is like that EG 20$ steam is 27$

replies.body:
Hey Phroke,

the TL:DR is no, you don't pay extra but as Jason mentioned below you have to play with exchange rate to see why (also depend on what payment method you use).


Assuming you are paying with credit card, here what you would get:
http://imgur.com/1n2sbNB

5 AUD - 520
10 AUD - 1100
20 AUD - 2250
35 AUD - 4000
50 AUD - 5900
100 AUD - 12100

In the US, you would have the following:
http://imgur.com/cbHkOFH

5 USD - 650
10 USD - 1380
20 USD - 2800
35 USD - 5000
50 USD - 7200
100 USD - 15000

Today's AUD / USD exchange rate is 0.72 therefore if you convert AUD in USD you will have the following:

3.6
7.2
14.4
25.2
36
72

Now in order to see the difference, you need to divide the RP granted by the cost

So in Australia, the RP you get per USD is this:

144.4444444
152.7777778
156.25
158.7301587
163.8888889
168.0555556

While in NA, the RP per USD is this:

130
138
140
143
144
150

As you can see, it is actually more ~~convenient ~~ cost efficient to purchase RP in Australia than in US right now.

Hope this helps.
- MM

> [{quoted}](name=MasterMirkinen,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=3R7Tn9Y7,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-03T01:15:45.422+0000)

> As you can see, it is actually more convenient to purchase RP in Australia than in US right now.
> 
> Hope this helps.
> - MM

Convenient? Do you mean economical or cost efficient?

trololololol .. jk don't ban me.

You learn something every day... 
Convenient does not translate well in English I guess eheh

Yes, economical and / or cost efficient is correct.
Sorry, I'm not English Native so you may find many mistakes when I write.

You get a lower amount of RP for the money than the US. e.g our $10 gets you 1100 RP in the us $10 gets you 1380

All the prices in the shop are AUD
So How much would i get with 25$ of RP or 50$??

You get the amount that it shows in the shop (50 = 5900, there is no 25)

The thing is that if you have the same amount in US (which is an unfair comparison because our dollar is worth less) you will get more (there 50 = 7200)

However 50 AUD is 36.11 USD right now, which is worth the 35 USD riot points transaction (5000)
if you buy 20$ worth of rp in oce you will get what the store says, which i believe is a little less than NA
